project1.title: Pint-E-Rest
project1.description: Pint-e-rest is a Pinterest-esk application that allows users to save images and links they are interested in to "cards", and sort them by board.

project2.title: Solar System
project2.description: Solar System is an application that allows users to search and learn about the planets in our solar system.

project3.title: Tamagotchi
project3.description: The classic key chain from the 90s is now in your browser! Kepp your pet alive by feeding, playing, fighting, and sleeping.

project4.title: Inebriated Shakespeare
project4.description: A website for the infamous theater troup Inebriated Shakespeare. It allows patrons to get up-to-date information on current shows, schedules, locations, and cast bios. It also allows Patrons to purchase tickets to upcoming shows and Inebriated Shakespeare original merchandise.
